_description: OpenClaw command presets for quick access. Add new commands here to extend the menu.
_note: Set 'editable': true on commands where users may need to modify parameters before running.

presets.name: Run Onboarding
presets.description: Interactive wizard to set up models, gateways, and channels

presets.name: Configure OpenClaw
presets.description: Update credentials, agent defaults, and channel settings

presets.name: Run Diagnostics
presets.description: Diagnose and auto-fix common issues (remove --fix to skip auto-repair)

presets.name: Update OpenClaw
presets.description: Update OpenClaw to the latest version

presets.name: Check Model Status
presets.description: Verify authentication and list available AI models

presets.name: Channel Login
presets.description: Login/authorize a channel (edit to specify channel name)

presets.name: Gateway Status
presets.description: Check the status of the gateway service

presets.name: View Gateway Logs
presets.description: Tail live gateway logs (remove --follow for static view)

presets.name: System Health Check
presets.description: Comprehensive system health and service check

presets.name: Install signal-cli
presets.description: Install signal-cli native binary (no Java required)

presets.name: Signal Register
presets.command: echo 'Step 1: Go to https://signalcaptchas.org/registration/generate.html' && echo 'Step 2: Solve captcha, right-click Open Signal link, copy link' && echo 'Step 3: Run: signal-cli -u +YOUR_PHONE register --captcha CAPTCHA_TOKEN' && echo '' && read -p 'Enter your phone number (e.g. +358401234567): ' PHONE && read -p 'Enter captcha token (signalcaptcha://...): ' CAPTCHA && signal-cli -u $PHONE register --captcha "$CAPTCHA"
presets.description: Register phone number with Signal (requires captcha from signalcaptchas.org)

presets.name: Signal Verify
presets.command: read -p 'Enter your phone number (e.g. +358401234567): ' PHONE && read -p 'Enter verification code from SMS: ' CODE && signal-cli -u $PHONE verify $CODE
presets.description: Verify Signal registration with SMS code

sameWindow.name: Run in current terminal
sameWindow.description: Execute command and show output here

newWindow.name: Open new WSL window
newWindow.description: Launch in a new terminal window
